oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Johnny Russell interview - Biff Collie
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Johnny Russell (performer), conducted by Biff Collie.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Biff Collie introduces Johnny Russell -- Johnny Russell talks about not being self conscious about his weight -- Russell talks about weighing close to 300 pounds -- Russell talks about his record Catfish John, and visiting restaurants that serve catfish -- Russell talks about Dicky Lee and the songs he wrote for Russell -- Russell talks about being all over the world, as well as Denver -- Russell talks about being held up at gun point when arriving at his hotel room in Denver once, then he was tied up and robbed -- Russell talks about the robber telling him to report this to get a write off on his income tax -- Russell talks about his friendship with Dicky Lee -- Russell talks about the robbers asking for a table at the venue that he was playing at that night -- Collie concludes the interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Russell, Johnny; Collie, Biff;
